Women's Health and Equal Rights Initiative (WHER) bụ nzukọ ehibere maka Nkwado ụmụ nwanyị Nigerian,nke  LBSMW n'edu na nke n'abụghị maka ego, na-elekwasị anya n'ịkwalite ihe ọmụma dị ukwuu banyere mmekọahụ na mmepe anya na nkọwa gbasara mmekọahụ, na-enye ọnọdụ  maka ịkwalite ọdịmma na nchedo ikike nke LBSMW na inye ohere ịnweta ahụike na ọrụ nkwado ndị ọzọ nye ụmụ nwanyị LBQ site na nkwado, agụmakwụkwọ, ike, na nkwado echiche oha.

Women's Health and Equal Rights (WHER)Initiative bụ nzukọ LBSMW mbụ na Naịjirịa nke Akudo Oguaghamba hiwere na 2011 na Abuja. Dị ka onye nsonye na Solidarity Alliance for Human Rights na njikọ ndị ọzọ nke ndị mmadụ n'otu n'otu na òtù na-arụ ọrụ na ichebe na ịkwalite ikike mmadụ nke ndị na-enwe mmekọahụ na nleda anya ụmụ nwanyị, WHER na-arụsi ọrụ ike na nkwado maka ọganihu na mmezu nke ikike mmadụ na ohere nhata maka ohere maka ụmụ nwanyị a na-eleghara anya na Nigeria. Ha emejuputala usoro ahụike uche na ọzụzụ ikike mmadụ, ọmụmụ ihe gbasara ike ego, ịkwalite uche, ọrụ nkuzi obodo. Nke gụnyere atụmatụ Sister2Sister ọhụrụ ha bu n'obi ịzụ ma wuo ndị isi na mba ahụ iji nye ndụmọdụ, nkwado ndị ọgbọ na ịhazi njikota nke obodo na obodo ha.
